data.title: Family Collections
data.text:
Family Collections - Cline

Dodee Cline's Collection

Surnames:

Bauer, Cline, Fenner, Himmel, Porter, Wilson

The following records were gathered by Dodee Cline and graciously donated for online posting. They are for personal use and NOT for commercial profit.

Thank you very much, Dodee!

Last Name, First/Middle/(Maiden) Names

Bauer, Amaler "Mollie" (Theshler)

Bauer, Elizabeth Barbara (Himmel)

Bauer, Michael

Bauer, Michael John

Cline, Betty

Cline, Bruce Paul

Wilson, Eunice (Peltier) Cline Jury

Amaler "Mollie" Bauer

Born: July 10, 1886, sun Cttlendorf, Austria

Father: Frank Theshler

Mother: Eva Unger

Husband: Michael Bauer

Married: January 31, 1905, Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Died: April 6, 1952, Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Cause of Death: Metasteses Carcinoma of Uterus, Spine and Liver

Age at Time of Death: 65 years

Buried: Mount Hope Cemetery, Port Huron, Michigan - Grave J 10 N Grave 5

Funeral Home: Karrer Simpson, Port Huron, Michigan

Elizabeth Barbara Bauer

Born: November 28, 1912, Brown City, Michigan

Father: John Himmel

Mother: Elizabeth Koppinger

Husband: Michael John Bauer (1906-1952)

Married: February 1929

Occupation: Owner & Operator of a Greenhouse on Yeager Street

Died: August 3, 1997, Richmond, Macomb Co, Michigan

Marital Status: Widow

Age: 84 years

Funeral: Pollock-Randall Funeral Home

Buried: Mount Hope Cemetery

Source: The Times Herald, Port Huron, Michigan, August 5, 1997

Michael Bauer

Born: January 16, 1879, Gothart, Austria-Hungary

Parents: Louis Bauer & Agnes Jost

Married: Amaler "Mollie" Tashler, January 31, 1905, Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Occupation: Grand Trunk Railroad

Died: November 9, 1959, Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Cause of Death: Cebral Thrombosis & Cardo Renal Disease

Age at Time of Death: 80 years

Funeral: Karrer-Simpson Funeral Home

Burial: Mount Hope

Sources: The Port Huron Times Herald, 1910 Census and the St. Clair County Clerk's Office (marriage).

Michael John Bauer

Born: September 9, 1906, Port Huron, Michigan

Wife: Elizabeth Barbara Himmel (1912-1997)

Married: February 1929

Occupation: Owner & Operator of a Greenhouse on Yeager Street

Died: March 5, 1952, Sarnia, Ontario, Canada

Age: 45 years

Funeral: Lucas Funeral Home

Buried: Mount Hope Cemetery

Source: The Times Herald, Port Huron, Michigan

Betty Cline

Born: February 4, 1934, Port Huron

Parents: Dougal Cline & "Lucille"

Died: March 24, 1934, (her home) Port Huron

Cause of Death: Accidental

Age at Time of Death: 1 month, 20 days

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block R, Lot 165, Grave 7

Bruce Paul Cline

Born: May 1, 1956, Port Huron

Parents: Victor Taft Cline & Gladys Irene Sherbutt

Died: May 1, 1956 - (Death Record #308)

Cause of Death: Stillborn

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block H, Lot 539, Grave 3

Clarence Cline - Obituary

Buried in Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block R, Lot 165, Grave 4

Dorothy Cline - Obituary

Died: March 19, 1916

Jennie E. Cline

Born: December 24, 1878, Point Edward, Ontario, Canada

Parents: James J. Morden & Elizabeth Campbell

Married: Abraham Cline, October 18, 1893, Port Huron

Died: December 30, 1928, Port Huron Hospital Emergency Room, Port Huron

Age at Time of Death: 52 years

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block R, Lot 165

Surviving Family: husband, Abraham Cline; five sons, Charles, Ralph, Clarence, Victor and Dougall; a daughter, Madeline Cline; four sisters, Mrs. Ed Stiler, Mrs. Claud Taylor, Mrs. George Vance and Mrs. Fred Leighton; a brother, William Morden; and her parents

Other Children: Alexander Lincoln Cline (died November 16, 1923) and an infant (died December 18, 1917)

Joseph T. Cline

Born: October 17, 1954, Michigan

Parents: Victor Taft Cline & Gladys Irene Sherbutt

Died: October 19, 1954 - (Death Record #884)

Cause of Death: Prematurity (6 months)

Age at Time of Death: 2 days

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block H, Lot 539, Grave?

Ralph Theodore Cline

Death Record #752

Born: June 7, 1904 in Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Father: Abraham Lincoln Cline

Mother: Genevieve "Jenny" Morden

Married: July 15, 1930, Stubenville, Ohio

Divorced: Eunice Peltier, 1948

Died: August 25, 1965, Port Huron, St. Clair County, Michigan

Cause of Death: Coronary Heart Disease, Pulmonary Edema

Age at Time of Death: 61 years

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Michigan - Block R Lot 165 Grave 3

Funeral Home: Arthur Smith

Source: Genealogy Findings - Court House - Obituaries

(Infant Girl of) Victor Taft Cline & Gladys Irene Sherbutt

Born: May 6, 1947

Died: May 6, 1947 - (Death Record #423)

Cause of Death: Stillborn - Transverse Presentation

Age at Time of Death: 0 hours

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block H, Lot 539, Grave 6&7

(Infant Girl of) Victor Taft Cline & Gladys Irene Sherbutt

Born: June 16, 1952, Michigan

Died: June, 16, 1952 - (Death Record #528)

Cause of Death: Malnutrition (Premature 6 1/2 months)

Age at Time of Death: 8 hours

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block H, Lot 539, Grave 5

Vivian Rose Cline

Born: February 1, 1945, Port Huron

Died: April 13, 1946, Port Huron - (Death Record #315)

Cause of Death: Gastra Enetritis, convulsions

Age at Time of Death: 1 year, 3 months, 14 days

Funeral: Arthur Smith Funeral Home

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Port Huron, Block H, Lot 539, Grave 6

Blanche Fenner

Parents: James Fenner & Nettie Cline, of Port Huron

Died: April 8, 1896, Port Huron - (Death Record #650; recorded May 20, 1897)

Cause of Death: Premature Birth

Status at Death: Female, White, Single - 8 hours old

Burial: Lot 50, Ward B, Clyde Cemetery (Kinney Cemetery), Clyde Twp, St. Clair Co, Michigan

James T. Fenner

Born: November 5, 1873, Carsonville, Michigan

Parents: Thomas Fenner & Mary Tennent (hard to decipher)

Married: (1) Nettie Cline - December 9, 1895, Port Huron, Michigan; (2) Susan Marie Millett; (3) Lillian Vahey

Occupation: Retired Painting Contractor

Died: January 11, 1961 - (Death Record recorded January 16, 1961)

Cause of Death: Cerebrovasular Hemorrhage with Hemiglegia

Age at Time of Death: 87 years

Death Record Informant: Lillian

Burial: Lakeside Cemetery, Block R, Lot 423, Grave 3

Sources: St. Clair County Clerk's Office & Lakeside Cemetery Office

Nettie Fenner - Obituary

Born: Amadore, Michigan

Parents: Mark Cline & Catherine Harrington

Married: James Fenner - December 9, 1895, Port Huron, Michigan

Occupation: Farming

Died: May 2, 1896, Kimball - (Death Record #785; recorded August 16, 1897)

Cause of Death: Milk Leg [a painful swelling of the leg soon after childbirth, due to thrombosis of the large veins]

Status at Death: Female, White, Married - 20 years

Burial: Lot 50, Ward B, Clyde Cemetery (Kinney Cemetery), Clyde Twp, St. Clair Co, Michigan

Elizabeth Himmel

Born: November 5, 1880, Austria-Hungary

Parents: John Koppinger & Eva Luffe

Married: John Himmel, February 4, 1897, Uywar, Austria-Hungary

Died: December 12, 1968, Goodells, St. Clair County Medical Center, Michigan

Age at Time of Death: 88 years

Funeral Home: Arthur Smith

Buried: Sacred Heart Cemetery, Brown City, Michigan

Sources: Times Herald, December 13, 1968 & Social Security Application (Parents names)

Betty Elizabeth Porter

Born: June 2, 1935, Port Huron, Michigan

Parents: Michael John Bauer (1906-1952) & Elizabeth Barbara Himmel (1912-1997)

Married: Arnold Ross Porter, September 29, 1951

Died: February 10, 1969, Port Huron, Michigan

Funeral: Lucas Funeral Home

Buried: Riverlawn Cemetery, Marysville, Michigan

Source: Port Huron Times Herald
